name: Black Eyed Pea Pumpkin Chard Chili. Glutenfree Vegan Recipe
description: Black Eyed Pea Pumpkin Chard Chili. Black eyed peas, pumpkin puree, herbs and spices make this a warming fall chili. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1  Jalapeno or Serrano pepper (use less or more to taste)
2  large Chard leaves chopped  (or other greens of choice)
Dried or fresh herbs (I used 1/2 tsp dried oregano, 2 teaspoons dried basil, 2 teaspoons fresh thyme)
1 cup Pumpkin puree or use chopped pumpkin
1 cup soaked Black eyed peas (about 1/2 cup dry, rinse and soak 2 hours (or 1 cup canned) or other beans of choice)
Variations: Add veggies like celery (corn, bell peppers. Add other beans like kidney, garbanzo, black and more.)

recipeInstructions.text: In a deep saucepan, add oil and heat over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a deep saucepan, add oil and heat over medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add bay leaves, peppers, onion and leek and saute until translucent. For Oil free version saute in vegetable broth.
recipeInstructions.name: Add bay leaves, peppers, onion and leek and saute until translucent. For Oil free version saute in vegetable broth.

recipeInstructions.text: Add garlic, chard leaves, and cook for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add garlic, chard leaves, and cook for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the spices, herbs and tomatoes and cook for another 5 minutes until tomatoes are a bit mushy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the spices, herbs and tomatoes and cook for another 5 minutes until tomatoes are a bit mushy.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the pumpkin puree, black eyed peas, water and salt and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the pumpkin puree, black eyed peas, water and salt and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover partially and cook on low heat for 1-1.5 hours. Stir a few times in between.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover partially and cook on low heat for 1-1.5 hours. Stir a few times in between.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust salt and spice. add lemon juice for tang if needed.
recipeInstructions.name: Taste and adjust salt and spice. add lemon juice for tang if needed.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook without cover for a few minutes if too runny, till desired consistency is achieved.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook without cover for a few minutes if too runny, till desired consistency is achieved.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with vegan butter/cream, chopped cilantro with Crackers, bread or garlic rolls.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot topped with vegan butter/cream, chopped cilantro with Crackers, bread or garlic rolls.

recipeInstructions.text: Alternatively, add the cooked onion tomato mixture and the rest of the ingredients to a slow cooker and cook according to instructions. 4-5 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Alternatively, add the cooked onion tomato mixture and the rest of the ingredients to a slow cooker and cook according to instructions. 4-5 hours.
